samples.ui
Class Table

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.Table

public class Table
extends Component

This class implements a graphical table. A table contains an optional header, and zero or more rows. The optional header and each row are instances of the TableRow class.

See Also:
TableRow

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action.

Overrides:
keyPressed in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The Table class handles actions of type Canvas.FIRE and notifies registered event listeners of an Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED. The Table class handles actions of type Canvas.UP and Canvas.DOWN.
key - The key pressed.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

Overrides:

key - The key released.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.
